Content.Text:
<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I was just... just feeding them.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Come on... let's go. Don't follow us,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This... this is not. I was just feeding
them.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad... glad you understood.
<PAGE>
But <MYNAME>... why did you get angry?
I thought you were being attacked
I thought you were picking on them

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You were worried... worried about me?
T-Thank you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... do you want to feed them... 
them as well?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The animals... loved it too. Thank you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I was happy... happy feeding them with
you.
<PAGE>
And really happy... when you worried
about me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I felt... how deeply you feel about
me, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'd never... never do that. <MYNAME>, how
horrible.
